definition: on the edge of/(fig.) on the verge of/close to
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: The red wolf has federally endangered status throughout its 29-state historic range.
sentences.chinese: 红狼在联邦的29个州已经是濒临灭绝的物种。

sentences.english: But today, fox hunting itself is on the verge of becoming an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，猎狐活动本身就快成为濒临绝种的东西了。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the traditional crafts of bamboo hat has endangered lost.
sentences.chinese: 花竹帽这项传统手工艺如今濒临失传。

sentences.english: I have help getting protection now, because I was near extinction.
sentences.chinese: 现在我受到了保护，因为我正濒临灭绝。

sentences.english: He was dying in the hospital when he celebrated his 22rd birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他在医院庆祝他的廿二岁生日时正濒临死亡。

sentences.english: Today's game is that I think the video card for the screen is dead or dying maybe unseated ?
sentences.chinese: 今天的比赛是，我认为视频卡银幕或濒临死亡也许倒？

sentences.english: The path verges on the edge of a precipice .
sentences.chinese: 这条小径濒临断崖的边缘。

sentences.english: The biggie is on the edge of bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 那名大亨濒临破产的边缘。

sentences.english: As Rebecca teeters on the brink of bankruptcy, she gradually begins to reassess her priorities in life.
sentences.chinese: 在濒临破产之际，她逐渐重新思考人生中重要的东西。

sentences.english: Now the AFS (Allied Free Sentients ), the galaxy's last free sentient beings, are on the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 现在，战地服务团，银河的最后众生濒临绝种。

sentences.english: New York City is advantageously situated on the banks of the Husdon River.
sentences.chinese: 纽约市濒临哈德逊河两岸，地势优越。

sentences.english: Yuanjiang city lies in the north of Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 沅江市位于湖南省北部，濒临洞庭湖滨。

sentences.english: It is bordered by the Med as well as Valencia and the Murcia region.
sentences.chinese: 这是濒临地中海，以及瓦伦西亚和穆尔西亚地区。

sentences.english: The Sulu elephants are thought to have originated in Java, where elephants are now extinct.
sentences.chinese: 苏禄大象认为均源自于爪哇，那里的大象正濒临绝种。

sentences.english: The St. Vincent Amazon panot is only the latest threatened animal to benefit from genetic profiling.
sentences.chinese: 鹦鹉只是受益于基因数据图表的最新濒临灭绝的动物。

definition: to be on the brink of/to be on the verge of
to collapse and fall apart (idiom); to break up/falling to pieces
caught in (a bad situation)/to fall into (trap etc)
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
to fall into enemy hands/to be occupied/to degenerate/to submerge
to fall/to drop/to decline/to deteriorate/to go downhill
